message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its exceptional quality and value, we believe it would be a great addition to your collection. We're offering it to you for $120, which we believe is a fair price considering its worth to you. We look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  While I see the value in your product, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am proposing to sell the product to you for $95. This price reflects a balance between the value of the product and your budget.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $90. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to accept.
